mapper.sql: a.id as a_id, a.point_id as a_point_id, a.type as a_type, a.answer as a_answer, a.analysis as a_analysis, a.uid as a_uid, a.status as a_status, a.create_time as a_create_time, a.update_time as a_update_time
a.content as a_content, a.options as a_options
mapper.insert: insert into question (id, point_id, type, answer, analysis, uid, status, create_time, update_time, content, options) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{pointId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{answer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{analysis,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{options,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
